channel.title: [PI] accients auto cast then change spell book
channel.description: Players are putting auto cast on with accients then changing their spell book to normal or lunar and using vengence and teleblock spells, how can i block them from doing this?

item.title: [PI] accients auto cast then change spell book
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.source: [PI] accients auto cast then change spell book

item.title: [PI] accients auto cast then change spell book
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:2, topic:377519”]Playerassistant -

	public void resetAutocast() {
		c.autocastId = 0;
		c.autocasting = false;
		c.getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);
	}

Change that to

public void resetAutocast() { c.autocastId = -1; c.autocasting = false; c.setSidebarInterface(0, 328); c.getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0); c.getItems().sendWeapon(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon], c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon])); } [/quote]

Thanks i hope it works would rep++

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] accients auto cast then change spell book

item.title: [PI] accients auto cast then change spell book
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Playerassistant -

	public void resetAutocast() {
		c.autocastId = 0;
		c.autocasting = false;
		c.getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);
	}

Change that to

public void resetAutocast() {
		c.autocastId = -1;
		c.autocasting = false;
		c.setSidebarInterface(0, 328);
		c.getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);
		c.getItems().sendWeapon(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon], c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]));
	}

Read full topic
